page.title: 02Pencalenick School
page.content: Pencalenick school is for children who have difficulty in learning.It used to be a Victorion mansion.It was built in 1881.But the school was opened in 1952.The school was started because the goverment didn't want the children who have difficulty in learning to sit at the back of the class doing nothing. The school is also a boarding school. The rooms contain about 6 beds.Most rooms have a television.There is 1 teacher for every ten children,and there is a teacher who specialises in deaf children and there are 8 classes in the school. There is a gymnasium and an out door swimming pool. There are 84 children in the school,of these 48 are boarded.
